overview:
Michael Carter is an investment banker who advises middle market and emerging businesses on raising institutional capital and on mergers and acqusitions. Carter Morse & Mathias is a boutique investment banking and financial advisory firm that specializes in:

Business sales and divestitures Buy side advisory Private placements of equity and mezzanine capital Senior debt financing Valuation services Financial and strategic advisory services

Industries of most interest are software, business services, healthcare services, education and training, aerospace and consumer.
